word: i just installed hoary and most things are gravy. Went all through the ubuntuguide.org page and got stuff installed and happy. For some reason though, I can't seem to install extensions for firefox....when I click on the install link, it asks me to save it to disk, as though it doesn't even recognize the file type....what gives?
there was something wrong with update.mozilla.org site a few days ago
the specifically instructed users to save the extensions to your local disk, then from inside firefox go to File -> Open File  and select the extension u saved earlier
